reference_components.note: Generated via CLI scan + manual code review

coderef_mcp.complexity: High - Multiple async handlers, validation, error handling
coderef_mcp.reason_for_archiving: Will be consolidated into unified coderef-context MCP server
coderef_mcp.impact: All 8 tools will be absorbed into coderef-context

hello_world_mcp.impact: None - not used in any workflows

scriptboard_mcp.reason_for_archiving: Specialized tool with minimal workflow use
scriptboard_mcp.impact: Agents lose scriptboard integration (restorable if needed)

chrome_devtools.reason_for_archiving: Browser automation not core to coderef workflow

key_patterns_identified: All archived servers use standard MCP protocol (mcp.server.Server base class)
Tool handler pattern: async def handle_*() with tool name prefix mcp__*__*
Error handling: Try/catch with structured response format
Configuration: Environment variables for external service URLs
gaps_and_risks: No test directory found (tests/, test/, or __tests__/)
